Henderson.Henderson Pavilion:
The Henderson Pavilion is an amphitheater in Henderson, Nevada that is used primarily for music performances.
The Henderson Pavilion is known for its 40,000-square-foot (3,700 m2) canopy style roof. This allows for the feeling of both being inside and outdoors at the same time.
The Henderson Pavilion is the largest open air amphitheater in Nevada, and the first of its kind in Southern Nevada.
The Henderson Pavilion is owned by the City of Henderson and is the home of the Henderson Symphony Orchestra, and the host of many of musical events each year.
It is located at 200 South Green Valley Parkway, Henderson, Nevada 89012, south of the I-215 freeway and the Green Valley Ranch.
